title: Academic Programs | UIC Admissions
contents: Explore UIC  Visit Virtually  Apply    S      Search Input     Submit        M       Academic Programs        Home  Graduate & Professional  You are here     Home  Graduate & Professional  You are here              Did you know?     DEPTH         i                     Due to the COVID-19 pandemic UIC continues to accept undergraduate first-year and transfer applications for the Fall 2020 semester.            Graduate Level Programs    Degree Programs  The Graduate Catalog provides detailed information for the graduate level degree programs offered at UIC, including links to the program's website and relevant contact information for program staff.  View All Graduate Degree Programs  If you're looking to see what the application requirements are for your intended program, see the program dropdown on our Apply page and access the Program Page link to reach the program's website.  Certificate Programs  The Graduate Catalog also provides a listing of available certificates offered at UIC - IBHE Certificates and Campus Certificates.  View Certificates         Professional Level Degree Programs    The following are the professional level clinical doctorate and specialty programs offered at UIC. Access the links below for more information about the colleges and their programs.    Professional Level Programs by College  Program  College   DPT , OTD   College of Applied Health Sciences   DMD , DMDAS , Advanced Specialty   College of Dentistry   MD   College of Medicine   DNP   College of Nursing   PharmD   College of Pharmacy                       How are you applying to UIC?
